alert.note: Alert for Southern Inner Channels (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 31 at 10:20AM AKST until January 01 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southern Inner Channels including Ketchikan, Saxman, Metlakatla, Thorne Bay, Hollis, Kasaan, and Meyers Chuck. * WHEN...Through midnight AKST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest snowfall rates expected from noon Friday through 9 PM Friday. A mix or change over to all rain is expected Friday night. Dry snow will accumulate quickly at the beginning of the event, then become wetter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
